Review.Contenu: I picked up MasterWriter to see if it would help me write some rhyming poems. It was the best move I made for this year. You still need to have talent to write, but MasterWriter opens up possibilities the many direction to take your writing. Then, the dictionary had words not listed on Microsoft Grammarly. I found that hilarious. Best program ever!
excellent writing tool. direct, human & helpful support.

At songwriting camp with John McCutcheon, I learned about and downloaded Master Writer, and it is a tremendous resource! Songs come together quickly when you have a rhyming dictionary and thesaurus like this handy. And being able to record works in progress is priceless where memory can fail to bring back that lick or turn of phrase that passed briefly though consciousness! With ease, I printed out my finished songs and performed them. It's a great tool for songwriters and poets! Like having a personal assistant to compose with!
The go-to software for songwriting. Not only providing rhymes, but synonyms, phrases and word families, all within a song-management framework. Could also be used for other writing forms.

Great tool for songwriting!  In addition to having rhymes and other "dictionary" features at my fingertips, it is also a great tool for song prompts.  I have all my lyrics in one place where they can be accessed from any computer.  I can add audio, email them, keep various versions of songs - in short all the tools I need other than my keyboard!

My original review of one star was written without my understanding of how the program operates. That was my fault. Within a couple of hours of posting my too hastily submitted harsh review, I received a phone call from the vice president of the company, who explained exactly what MasterWriter was designed to do. He offered to refund my entire purchase price. However, after he cleared up my misconceptions I told him I wanted to try MasterWriter again for a few months to see whether it worked for me.I appreciate his reaching out to me personally.

I just paid for another 2 year membership with ease. I enjoy this program as it keeps all my song lyrics in one place with many features to help with writing song lyrics to have ready for a recordable song. Thanks for such an amazing program like Masterwriter!

I'm hooked on Masterwriter. I don't even want to try to write lyrics without it. There are so many great options which not only help with things like rhyming, but also help to spawn additional idea. I used to used a rhyming dictionary, a thesaurus, and other things like dictionaries of colloquialisms and idioms. Masterwriter provides all of this! It's my go-to tool for writing and it helps that I be standing in line at the grocery store and I can work on a song on my phone. AND the tech support is top notch!

Review.Titre: When you need that just perfect word
Review.Contenu: When writing for online or major publications, the right word makes the difference between an article and a story.Despite writing daily, I find that there are times when the perfect word will not quite come forward out of the mental cobwebs. MasterWriter delivers every time, even if I do not know the exact synonym -- or better still -- correct spelling. The site always come through with what I need.

MasterWriter has enhanced my writing immensely. No longer am I pondering for hours day or night for tight, energizing and appropriate words.  In submitting my work, I was told my line edits were perfect and I had a natural talent for world building. And that is thanks to MasterWriter! I couldn't do without it!

Review.Titre: MasterWriter adds several, valuable new tools to your toolkit.
Review.Contenu: MasterWriter offers so many tools that you wouldn't even be thinking about - synonyms, expressions.  It just opens all kinds of doors vs. the typical process where you might just stop when you can't find a reasonable rhyme.  It really feeds the creative engine in so many ways.

Review.Titre: The creative tools master writer offers
Review.Contenu: The creative tools master writer provide has help many times with my writer’s block.  Thank you Master Writer.

Review.Titre: MasterWriter opens the door to a whole…
Review.Contenu: MasterWriter opens the door to a whole new world of ideas. Not just the usefulness of different literary tools such as dictionary, thesaurus, synonyms etc., but it sparks ideas that one may have not thought of. I have written and released 5 albums which have been critically acclaimed since 2011 using MasterWriter. I have not used the recording capability. I also feel the earlier version was a bit more in depth.

Vocabulary is the spice of every great story, Masterwriter has helped me transform my novel from ordinary to extraordinary, many times I feel like a kid in a candy store. Masterwriter should be every artist's companion.

Review.Titre: I switched MacBook Pro computers last…
Review.Contenu: I switched MacBook Pro computers last year and discovered my old download version did not work with the new operating system and thought I had lost all of my songs.  Once I went on line and subscribed I could use my old files for all of my songs!

Masterwriter keeps my thoughts (words and music) organized to the point where I can super easily bounce from idea to idea with clarity and confidence. The fact that nothing ever gets lost unlocks my creative potential. Some days I do three separate cowriting sessions, and can later return to the songs without missing a beat. I've been a satisfied customer since version one. Highly recommended!

Review.Titre: Great program, but not for me.
Review.Contenu: Even though I was not happy with Master Writer program, I do think the production and layout is great. The tools provided are very impressive. I’ve been a songwriter for many years and have developed a rhythm with free apps and tools to help me in my journey. Some apps I’ve paid for. But it’s a 3 or 4 dollars each time. So trying to be convinced to pay more is a hard line to accept. But after trying the program, I know now what it is and what its not and have a better opinion. I think it would be amazing for some people. But not for everyone. I still give it 5 stars for its quality and strong comprehensiveness.
Great customer service. I recommend this for anyone wanting to write a song or book. Matt was very helpful

The ease with which you can navigate a lyric is like a running dialogue between several cowriters. New ideas get fostered by unexpected rhymes. They can alter a  story line or just smooth it out and make it sound conversational.

Sure you can use Google Docs or Evernote but this app is dedicated to lyric writing. Once opened, there is no need to open up other tabs or consult a rhyming dictionary - everything is integrated. In the age of information overload, this is a phenomenal tool for activating and sustaining flow state. This alone is worth the cost of admission!

Review.Titre: I like it. Easy to use.
Review.Contenu: It has worked better for me than anything I have used in the past.All the other ones, and there have been quite a few always ended up with me losing my project due to some computer snafu that I couldn't figure out. I still have those songs but can't open the file, or if I can it's unreadable.

M.R. Is a rare class act co.=====================I was contacted by Matt with Master Writer to express theirConcern of the handling of an unfortunate breakdown of communication between Master Writer and myself. The communication was resolved being to both of our satisfaction. Formerly being a member a few years back and having former association with Master Writer without problems I will re associate myself with them again. Master Writer is a valuable asset to writers as it is for me being a songwriter in Nashville ..Thank You,Mike DuncanGallatin, Tn

I really enjoy this app.  It helps me find that elusive word that fits into a line. Lyrics are the more challenging part of my songwriting practice and Master Writer has saved me on many occasions! Just tonight, I worked on a line that needed a rhyme and needed to convey a certain meaning. It just wasn't coming until I opened the app, typed in the word needing a rhyme.  And there it was! This app speeds up the writing process for me.  Yes, I would recommend this for any songwriter: beginner, intermediate or professional.

MasterWriter makes lyric writing much more efficient that I imagined. Everything you need - demo, rough draft, research materials, etc. - is all in one place. The hardest part of MasterWriter is finally convincing yourself to put old habits in the drawer.
I believe this is a very valuable tool. I’m stating to really get into it and rely on it first. I believe it’s triggering better ideas and writing.

MasterWriter is a helpful resource when I'm struggling to come up with a word or phrase that works with my song. I like working with it a lot, but it might be even better if it had an option to do musical notation, at least for the melody line of the song. I don't know if that's even possible to incorporate, but it's just a thought.

Review.Titre: Great for writing, but lacks other features
Review.Contenu: UPDATED:After I wrote the below review, I was contacted by customer support. They helped me with understanding how the Group function works and how I can use that to do many of the things that I was missing for tracking and categorizing songs. Also how to eliminate the website link from being printed. Plus they added some of my suggestions to review as possible future features. Top notch support! Updated my review to 5 stars!-------------The writing part works great. Great resources for finding the right words. I think it lacks in other functionality that would benefit the songwriter. Such as track the song after writing (copywrite info, publisher or promotional info), Printing functionality (does not print any composer information, copyright info, dates...). I hate that it prints the web address! Not pro looking printing.

Review.Titre: This is the only tool I use
Review.Contenu: This is the only tool I use. Super intuitive for finding the right words and phrases that complete the creative process and then quickly record those ideas. Every time I find myself stuck in a song, it seems like Masterwriter gets me out of that jam.

Review.Titre: I have been looking for something like this
Review.Contenu: I have been looking for something like Master Writer for years, it can be very helpful when you run out of ideas, being endorsed by David Foster is a definite plus, it gives you an idea on how goGood it is.

Review.Titre: Everything I need in one place!
Review.Contenu: Since I have had Master Writer, I have written or co-written four musicals which would not have been written had I not had all the tools of Master Writer in one place. Now I simply write every song with it. I can't imagine trying to write a song with my Clement Wood rhyming dictionary and a thesaurus and even these do not give me a fraction of what Master Writer does.

The word/phrase look-up features are really helpful. Would love to see the ability to format text a bit to help with organization.Update: Actually, it does have text formatting, so bumping to five stars!

Review.Titre: I really like the ‘landing page as well…
Review.Contenu: I really like the ‘landing page as well as the ease of use .The program is quite effective in expanding lyric ideas.

I love everything about MasterWriter... The big change for me was being able to write in a paperless environment and have all the resources I need to rewrite and edit in the same place.  Being able to uplaod the music that goes with my lyrics and share them from the same location is also a time saver that I find makes the task effortless.  Thank you for your efforts on behalf of us songwriters!

Review.Titre: I gave a poor review before because I…
Review.Contenu: I gave a poor review before because I didn't understand how to properly use Masterwriter. Well after a very nice phone call with Matt all was explained to me. Now I am using Masterwriter with my WP and all is great. Masterwriter is great to use, it gives my writing a boost where I need it. Thanks Matt for taking time from your day and help me get started.

Review.Titre: Master Writer - Invaluable aid since I first purchasd it on floppy.
Review.Contenu: I have been using Master Writer, since I first bought it on floppy disks, many years ago.  As a singer-songwriter, I dreaded the writers block phenomena. When I found Master Writer all those years ago - I didn't worry about it any longer. I have used it 100 times not only to get past writers block, but to fuel thoughts for a new song or a new song concept. It continues to this day to be an invaluable artistic aid.

Review.Titre: This is a useful tool for songwriters
Review.Contenu: This is a useful tool for songwriters.  I mainly use the rhyming feature, but some of the others as well.  My only concern about it is storing all my songs in it, as a personal matter, if I decide to leave the system how I get all of that information back out.  For what I use it for, I am not sure I would pay $100 a year, but at $50, which is what I renewed it, I feel it is a good value and would recommend this to any songwriter.

For the last 15 years I've been using MasterWriter, in one form or another, as a tool in my songwriting toolkit and MasterWriter has alway been true to their word. Never stare at a blank page ever again! Thank you, MasterWriter.

I had used Master Writer a few years ago, and I've come back to it now that I'm back into songwriting.Today's version provides a great user experience supported by tools that help me focus on creativity instead of thumbing through my rhyming dictionary and thesaurus. It also helps with brainstorming by suggesting idioms, alliteration and so on.

Writing is laborious; good writing is more so. MasterWriter takes it to an almost enjoyable level! I use it for all my writing. I particularly like the Word Families dictionary as it enlivens my communication. When I have difficulty putting thoughts to paper I rely on MasterWriter’s tools to help me unscramble my thoughts. As a bonus, the constant reliance on the app has actually made me a better writer.

Review.Titre: I used them before my cancer so I'm…
Review.Contenu: I used them before my cancer so I'm glad to be able to start with them again. They have lots of avenues for you to go sometime I couldn't find the right words an they're system got me where I wanted to get to

Review.Titre: I’d like it better if there was an app…
Review.Contenu: Update! Masterwriter promptly replied to my review wanting to know how they could improve. Honestly, other than not having an app currently, it’s a very good songwriting tool. In the past, I used the program on my computer. Now I primarily write on my phone and have grown accustomed to my current process. While Masterwriter is an all-in-one program with a massive dictionary of rhymes, a thesaurus, and so much more, I just didn’t feel like it was for me at this time. When they develop the app, I may try it again. Many thanks to Masterwriter for reaching out to me.

Because my previous program was an obsolete CD, I was forced to use two laptops side by side, I subscribed to Master Writer. As a published author, I find it efficient and provides all the tools I need readily available with a click while I am writing.

You helped me get my book, The Dealer, How One California Dealership Fueled the Rise of Ferrari Cars in America, published successfully. I could not have written it without your help. Thank you. Jim Ciardella

I used to keep a total of 6 books beside me when writing. They collectively helped me find words when I was stuck. Master writer is a dream because everything I need plus some I right with me, accessible to the page I’m writing. What could better than that. I’ve been using Master Writer for 10+ years and will continue to do so.

Review.Titre: instant access to words and helping generate ideas!
Review.Contenu: Masterwriter stimulates creativity by helping me find words and phrases that sound natural quickly and efficiently. It helps me keep my message on point, and saves me valuable time in the process.I love it!

Review.Titre: I use Masterwriter all the time and…
Review.Contenu: I use Masterwriter all the time and really enjoy having a place to keep my lyrics and send audio files to make things easier in working with my co-writers.  I write a lot of songs so this really helps keep me organized.

Longtime user here. Since Master Writer was on CD.  It’s my go to when writing lyrics. I still think the formatting for printing could be better. Like, put all lyrics on one page or screen for better workflow. But it’s like my best friend for writing quick.

An invaluable tool for songwriters.  Not only are great resources provided like a very comprehensive rhyming dictionary, but you have a convenient location for all your work-in-progress as well as an archive of all your finished work all together in one place that is accessible from anywhere and from any device.  I use MasterWriter even to capture all my new ideas.  Great knowing they're right there in MasterWriter ready for me to work on all the way to completion.  Plus all your work gets automatically dated when you start work on it giving you a chronological record of your creative journey.  MasterWriter also has great customer support if ever needed.

Review.Titre: For songwriters who prefer to craft their lyrics while experimenting a bit
Review.Contenu: I've been finding MasterWriter to be a very helpful, user-friendly tool for exploring and testing lyrics and rhymes. It's not based on AI (so-called "Artificial Intelligence"). Rather, it relies on making available all sorts of comprehensive, practical references and guides that, in my experience, serious songwriters use anyway. But MasterWriter brings them all together in a way that's fast, vast, and very convenient. It's not magic and it doesn't pretend to take over the lyric-writing process. The design is a bit "old-fashioned" in its look, but the functionality is 100% robust.I think it's best suited to songwriters who take pride in really crafting their songs in their own, unique way.

Review.Titre: Best tech and customer service anywhere!
Review.Contenu: My Masterwriter had expired before I could upgrade it, and they went all out to help me get my new, current version going.  They really researched the issues I was having and they were there for me every step of the way.  Matt is amazing - everyone at Masterwriter is at the top of their game and their customer service is fabulous - has been since the start.  They get a 10 out of 10 from me - how about 100 out of 10?

Review.Titre: I love the easy access to all sorts of…
Review.Contenu: I love the easy access to all sorts of tools including rhyming and thesaurus- it makes for on the spot inspiration! The archive of songs I have written is so easy to access if I need to go back for any reason. I also love the fact that you can write versions of songs without overwriting. Great platform!

Review.Titre: A uniquely helpful tool for writers of all genres.
Review.Contenu: I've been using Masterwriter almost since its inception twenty years ago. It is the most uniquely useful program I've ever seen for finding that perfect word, phrase, or concept, when the creative mind can't quite get there on its own. I've used it as a honing tool for my prose, poetry, songs, technical writing, and even simply to brainstorm new ideas in general. When I feel that nearly imperceptible dissatisfaction with a turn of phrase or a word that I know is close but not quite what I'm trying to convey, Masterwriter gives me many alternatives, both words and phrases, that will offer exactly the answer I needed, or just as often presents me with a whole new bank of ideas that gives the work an exciting turn I hadn't contemplated. Five stars for this unique program that does what no other resource can do.

Love the feature of completing the sentence and wider / widest rhyme matching. I don’t want to use ‘in a sentence’ phrase for phrase, but it certainly helps spark the creative process in a positive direction when you feel like you’re stuck.

Review.Titre: An all around great tool for communicating
Review.Contenu: This is a great resource for finding the perfect word or phrase or any of the other options MasterWriter hasIt also has helped in broadening my vocabulary in writing poems, email or in person eye to eye conversations

First, I've known about MasterWriter since it started. Now I have a chance to use it. I have not finished the song yet, but I will. I like that everything I need to develop my songwriting is in one app on my phone. I am not bound, I can expand my songwriting vocabulary and create better song lyrics.
As I am not very Tech savvy, the tutorial was very helpful. In addition, Matt was outstanding when I needed extra help. Many thanks. This system is terrific for writers.

Review.Titre: MasterWriter became a better for me the second time around
Review.Contenu: A couple years ago I wrote a review giving MasterWriter one star and may have said , I found MasterWriter not very useful. I was just starting to write ideas down and nothing was lyrically happening so I stop even trying use it. I continued I increase my song writing skill by reading books on song writing and really started paying close attention to great lyrics. So I decided to give MasterWriter another shot because I felt I might have a more descriptive direction to what I want to say and needed to find a creative rhyme and MasterWriter really has been an outstanding tool. So maybe the first time I was to impatient but now I am writing more and enjoying using MasterWriter.
Fantastic tool for songwriting. I've used it for years, and it's helped me write some of my best songs. Great for organising and keeping track of who I wrote which songs with as well.

Review.Titre: MasterWriter really helped me spice up…
Review.Contenu: MasterWriter really helped me spice up my novel with an alternative word that changed the trajectory of the paragraph. Made me feel like a writer and not a hack.

Review.Titre: MasterWriter provides a new level of writing
Review.Contenu: MasterWriter has sent me to a whole new level of writing and imagination. MasterWriter is a must-have tool for any author, writer, editor, and all of the above. Worth every penny.
Best writing assistant ever created.Since I started using MW I been writing 1 song per week.However, I wish you had the Spanish version of this program.Thank you MW

Love MasterWriter, fantastic resource. Had a little problem with my subscription renewal but Matt DeVorzon and Madeleine M were super helpful and friendly, they fixed the problem without delay. Very much appreciated and I will continue to subscribe to MasterWriter.

I likevhaving all my songs im working on in the same place instead of wherever i save them, and then cant find.Good rhyming dictionary.  I like being able to record a melody that goes with the lyrics and vice versa.

Review.Titre: I MasterWriter is an incredible product…
Review.Contenu: I MasterWriter is an incredible product that helps writers perfect their not only their projects but their skills as writers it’s definitely worth getting.

It's like I have another set of eyes and ears. If the words don't come, I just ask my co writer what they can come up with. I'm very pleased with my co writers ideas, suggestions. I think we'll be writing together for a long , long time.
The application is great. It has helped my song writing, not with the tools, but just that I have a central location for my stuff and I can easily share.

Review.Titre: I'm an old man now,but it's a lot of fun
Review.Contenu: I'm an old man now, 71. I put the guitar down for about 30 years or so, never was very good. But a friend of mine passed away and his brother gave me his old Gibson Gospel. It rekindled my interest in the guitar and I kept remembering bits and pieces of songs I started making up when I was in my 20's. Your site has been great as I try to finish a few of those old ideas and a few new ones. It's a lot of fun.

Review.Titre: I like being able to keep my thoughts…
Review.Contenu: I like being able to keep my thoughts and ideas separately for all songs, from just starting to completed. Have been using MasterWriter for close to 15 years.
MasterWriter is fantastic! Its one of the best tools I have in my writers box!Only downside I have is that you cant purchase lifetime membership and instead have to stick to subscription.
I have only had a short time to "play" with this program but LOVING it. So fun having a helper, assistant, editor, and sounding board all in one place!

Review.Titre: Happy to be back with MasterWriter
Review.Contenu: The last round of updates were significant enough for my needs that I switched back to MasterWriter.  Additionally, all of my support questions have always been answered.
My volcubalary is deminishing because of old age. Master Writer helps a lot.

Review.Titre: Getting the software is easier than…
Review.Contenu: Getting the software is easier than using the software but I'm trying

Review.Titre: Best songwriting tool on the market
Review.Contenu: Best songwriting tool on the market.  Have used it for years and am so thankful to see the newest features and functionality.  Keep up the good work folks

Review.Titre: This program rocks the world for…
Review.Contenu: This program rocks the world for writers, being a world writer for episodic TV, scenes, monologues,and booksThis has changed my life and has given me the powerfor the perfect words.Sedly Bloomfield
I have been a Masterwriter user since it's version 2.0 which I still sometime use on the computer and now online version 3.0. It's allowed me to write songs that has won me songwriters awards.

Review.Titre: Another tool in my arsenal as a writer
Review.Contenu: Another tool in my arsenal as a writer. I love having it at my disposal when writing my book. Easy to use and I have only scratched the surface of what it has to offer.

Review.Titre: I have been using MasterWriter for…
Review.Contenu: I have been using MasterWriter for several years. It’s a great tool box for songwriters and an awesome way to save, edit and document work.

Review.Titre: Every time I call with a question or…
Review.Contenu: Every time I call with a question or concern the call is returned promptly and professionally from the staff.MasterWriter is a great resource to put a thought to paper.
Works as advertised, which is to say GREAT.I've been using it for songwriting, corporate creative work, and more.

Review.Titre: Masterwriter has allowed me to unlock…Unlock writers block
Review.Contenu: Masterwriter has allowed me to unlock my writers block to be able to complete the final song on my new album that will be coming out in 2023.

Review.Titre: I received excellent service when I ran…
Review.Contenu: I received excellent service when I ran into difficulty understanding how to best use all the assets of the site. The person helping me was patient and we got the situation handled to my satisfaction.

Review.Titre: Great tool to give you new ideas when…
Review.Contenu: Great tool to give you new ideas when you’re stuck or need a bit of inspiration. I also find it very practical as the central place and storage for all my lyric ideas.Michael

Review.Titre: The download was easy, support great
Review.Contenu: The download was easy plus support walked me through uploading the files from my previous version on an older computer

Review.Titre: Masterwriter makes it EASIER for Songwriters!
Review.Contenu: Makes it EASY for me to organize,and get my Lyrics typed.GOOD to have the major parts to my Songs in ONE Place! Lyrics,Melody,Harmony.Reasonable Monthly rate.

I am a poor speller and have a comma problem. Love the fact my misspelling is corrected and that comma help is rendered as needed. Also like that the program works on all my platforms including email.
MasterWriter is a wonderful toolbox of several features that greatly assists me in writing a lyric. Any time I write, I always have MasterWriter open and ready to help!

Review.Titre: I’m a writer and your app has been…
Review.Contenu: I’m a writer and your app has been invaluable in my soon to be published novel. Thanks for providing a decidedly use fool writing tool.

Review.Titre: What I like quite well are the many…
Review.Contenu: What I like quite well are the many options you can work with. And within the options you have an abundance of choices. The Word Families section is really good.  It’s a way to work with feelings.
